author: Hassan T.

description: We tried to pay with a large bill and they woke us up an hour later at 3 AM to accuse us of paying with counterfeit money! Then they tried to take a credit card number to cover the bill without returning our payment! Unacceptable as a legitimate business!!!
author: Max M.

description: My first experience with Mustafios was when I showed up to visit my girlfriend in the city late on a Thursday night, as I do twice a month. As a New Jersey native I was somewhat wary about trying anything when it came to California pizza. I scoured yelp and postmates for something open at 1am when I came in and was lucky enough to come upon Mustafios. We ordered a combo pie. Within 40 minutes our pie was at the front door, warm, smelling like afternoon delight on a sunny beach. Me and my significant other devoured the pie, and it was glorious. Yes, its not traditional and the slices are in these awkward long cube pieces, yes the crust has something to be desired, but honestly the pizza is completely worth it at the price point.  The combo is loaded with toppings, and these toppings are like starter, mvp, hall of fame quality toppings; the mushrooms actually taste like they spent some time ordering them. Since that first encounter I have ordered from Mustafio's "delivery" 3 times. Each time I have been completely satisfied with the timeliness of the delivery and the quality of the food received; it should also be noted that during two of these instances I had no whiskey to drink at all. Ultimately my main take away is this: A decent pie ad a good price at any level of inebriation. Cheers.
author: Justin S.

description: So this is my go to spot after work. It's conveniently placed right in the heart of Polk st. by all of the bars. The employees are always extremely nice and even remember my order since I come I'm a lot haha. The pizza is amazing. You get a nice big square slice of Za that's perfectly crispy on the bottom and has cheese so nicely golden brown on top that Michelangelo and Da Vinci would bow to it. I highly recommend if you like pizza and nice people come here. Also cheapest pizza on Polk.
author: Roy F.

description: Great place, along with great workers! Would definately come here again whenever im in the city!
author: Ahmad H.

description:
The pizza here is delicious! I have a simple taste in pizza, so I ordered a pepperoni slice, and wasn't disappointed. The crust had a fluffy texture, with a healthy amount of marinara sauce and fresh cheese. The pepperoni itself was crispy and tasty. 
The owner of the restaurant is courteous, and service was quick.
For the more adventurous pizza eater, there's a plethora of toppings to choose from, as well as sandwiches, desserts, salads, and calzones.
I will definitely be eating here again!
author: Misha H.

description: I ordered Hawaiian and pepperoni pizza from this place for the first time as a delivery a while ago. A friend told me about this place so I thought I should give it a shot. My pizza was delivered so quickly for the first time ever in my life and they were also amazing! The guy who I ordered the pizza from recommended me to try the pepperoni pizza with jalapeños on them so I went for it and my fam loved every bite that they took! I decided to take a couple friends to this place a couple days ago to try the pizza themselves and they also enjoyed it! The service was just as I expected with very kind workers. I will be back and they will be my number one on my pizza list whenever I wanna order some pizza for delivery(: I recommend this place to any pizza lovers out there!
author: Janice G.

description: I stopped in for a quick slice of pizza based on a recommendation from a friend.  As many restaurants as there are on Polk St, its tough to find a worthy slice to go. That was before I stepped into Mustafio's. I went with the standard cheese. They do the large square slices here and for $3.30 it was a reasonable SF slice price. The pizza was solid, the crust was well done, and the sauce tasted like normal old school Italian pizza. Definitely worth a pop in for a slice.
author: Steven G.

description: NOPE! After waiting an hour and 45 minutes I get a cold pizza with the wrong toppings.  Hell no. I hate onions! dang!!!
author: California B.

description: Been around the world and had some really great pizza. I accidentally stumbled across this place last night and was surprised to find a short line and the the best pizza I had ever tasted. The chicken pesto pizza was like the first time I went to Disney land in my mouth.. Highly suggest stopping by and picking up a slice, or four.
author: Brett T.

description: Stopped in for the first time last night after an event at GAMH. Had a couple of great slices. Will be going back.
author: Austin W.

description: This is the best pizza in San Francisco. I think it misses some fanfare because it's mostly consumed by Polk St drunks who don't notice. It's actually the ideal pizza and THE BEST pizza in the city. The crust is perfectly fluffy and chewy. The cheese is perfect. It's great to order a whole pie or by the slice. Mustafio's is exactly how pizza should be.
author: Dana W.

description:
Went in to this place once and wished I never did.
I ordered a slice of pizza and a snapple. A few minutes later (I was entertained by the noisy and unprofessional people in the back/kitchen. clowning around and giving each other high fives!
The guy came out from the back and served me the slice but totally forgot the drink.
He was in the back with his "friends" so quickly that I had to go near the back and get his attention!
Got my drink and as he walked away (I'm not kidding) he picked his bunched up pants in an unflattering spot, well you know what I mean. A guy serving food?
I was grossed out and seriously couldn't take another bite of my pizza.
The pizza was not very good anyway but I have gotten used to the fact that most places can't even make a good marinara sauce if their life depended on it.
To top it off, when I got back in my car, which was parked in front some guy from the pizza place, comes out with a broom and starts sweeping all the crap on the street right on to my freshly washed car!  These guys are truly clowns and should maybe join the circus instead of trying to run a pizza place!
author: Jerry S.

description: Pizza here is always great! Awesome customer service from Yahya the owner. House made ranch cups are great! Place is super clean inside. So happy to have found this little gem!
author: Lauren M.

description: Omg has good reviews but i just called and was put on hold at least thats what the girl thought because i heard her entire conversation with some other girl about how cute and sexy she thought some guy was they went back and forth for 7 min about this guy and there date then this girl with a heavy Mexican accent somehow couldn't understand my perfect english i said gyro she heard calzone i said elles street she heard polk i said seven she heard three.  Dont know what my total bill is because she didnt tell me.  I will not post this review till i receive my food so i can see if the food is better than the phone etiquette that cant be to hard to do considering the experience so far.  Glad i waited the food sucks the lettuce is limp and slimy the tomato is aswell overall i waited over a hour was very dissatisfied with the food and service never trust a pizza place that cuts its pizza in squares.    Overall avoiding this place would be wise
author: Cindy W.

description: DELIVERY.......Easy to order...ONLINE. They were a few minutes late but that's fine for me ! As for the pizza, delicious !!! I had the Special and the BBQ Chicken. Good job boys !!!
author: Eddie I.

description: They got unique rectangular pizzas and they are tasty. Also Alex is a cool guy, kind and easy to talk with. Mustafio's pizza is awesome!
author: Gregory K.

description: When I want delivery and I don't want to wait for Patxi's, I order Mustafio's.  Mustafio's pizza is square - not bad at all.  Buffalo wings are juicy too.
author: Wakako U.

description: Mustafio's USED TO BE the BEST pizza in the whole dang city!! No kidding. Home made, hand tossed, crust that was to die for. Generous, and FRESH, toppings!! NOT ANYMORE!! Me & Hubby were enjoying a day off and decided to call for delivery. What a disaster!! It was OLD pizza!! I mean "old" as in it had been previously cooked--toppings were limp and greasy. They had attempted to re-heat in in the oven. YUK!! It was BURNED. The crust was HARD CHARCOAL. It was disgusting. We were SHOCKED and disappointed. I mean, we LOVED their pizza. I called and told the young lady on duty about it. She was just silent. No apology, no offer of another pizza, just dead silence. I got the feeling she felt as if I was "bothering" her. NEVER ORDERING FROM HERE AGAIN!!
author: Sabrina R.

description: Ordered this AWESOME pizza from this wonderful lady name Shana? She gave us her suggestions and was very helpful. Hopefully we get our pizzas soon because the party is hungry! great customer service, love this place already!
author: Joey K.

description: Ordered delivery and it took an hour so that was unfortunate but the food was still great
author: Aanand P.

description: Loveeeee mustafios!  Perfect late night bite in Russian Hill! Stop by, you won't regret it!
author: Jordan S.

description: Got delivery from here. Chicken pesto pizza was awesome. They definitely don't skimp in the toppings!! Wings were so-so. Definitely recommend this place!
author: J. M.

description: This is my go to spot for pizza. Any day any night, I can always trust mustafios pizza to have THE freshest, cheesiest, pepperoniest pizza ever. Always great customer service. You can't beat great food and great service. I would give it 10 stars if I could.
author: Brent L.

description: Have used their online ordering for couple of times now. Pizza is always on time and the best I have had in my stay in SF. I'm a fan off adding extra toppings to my pizzas and they have still always got it right. Toppings are plentiful too. No complaints from me.
author: Mika P.

description: I've been here twice now and both times when I was pretty wasted. I was expecting amazing pizza because I ws wasted, but even my dulled out tastebuds were like ehhh this is ok. The crust is good. It's greasy with little flavor. More likely than not I'd come back for another drunk night munchie session. It reminds me of cafeteria pizza with a better crust.
author: Christina L.

description: Hot pizza, thin crispy crust, quick friendly service. Winner!  Great alternative to that a-hole, Victor up the block.
author: The P.

description: The pizza that I just ate here is some of the best pizza I've had in sf. I love chicken pesto.
author: Elias G.

description: Buyer beware. I had a slice of chicken pizza and was so sickened by salmonella I nearly required hospitalization. The pizza slices also sit in the window sometimes for hours. Shut 'em down.
author: L T.

description: If you're in the mood for pizza. Look no further. Mustafio's is the place to eat! Excellent pizza and good service! Check them out!
author: Carly V.

description: Excellent pizza. Hot and really good tasting. The guys behind the counter waited on us and were really nice. Unexpected for a little pizza shop like this. Highly recommend!
author: Kory H.

description:
Welcome to my new favorite Pizza by the Slice spot.  I've had every pizza this city can offer, and this is hands down the best late night pizza spot.  Not just in the quality of the food, which is amazing, but also in the quality of the service.  I've eaten here a dozen times already and it's friendly service every time.  This can be rare in pizza shops around downtown, as some of you may know.

It's simple.  If you like great pizza with friendly service, eat here.
author: Jason k.

description:
I had a Mustafio's deliver me a vegetarian special pizza yesterday.  Super nice guys and a great pizza.  The style is thicker than a neopolitan, thinner than cheeseboard/arzimendis, sturdier than Za (but still tender), while not being doughy at all (like Victor's).  Great toppings and menu variety as well (a combo of standards and unique)

Did I mention delivery? Delivery.  Also the guys on the phone and doing delivery are super legit.

10/10, would repeat.
author: Josh F.

description: I just moved to the neighborhood and needed pizza delivery after a long day of unpacking. I chose Mustafio's because of their good reviews. I was not disappointed. Great pizza. The sauce is very well balanced and the ingredients were fresh. Delivery was fast.
author: Kyle S.

description: Based on others reviews, it might be best to eat in here. We had pizza delivered and it took over an hour and the pizza was cold and soggy. Won't be ordering delivery here again, but might be worth trying at the restaurant.
author: Carly K.

description: this square pizza is out of this world! I remember back in the day there was Little Cesar's... this is like their brother! I found my dream pizza stop. the staff is great, super friendly, helpful, and provides exceptional customer service. the pizza is cheesy and full of flavorful toppings with generous portions. loved the salad as well. if you're on Polk, make this your new pizza spot. plenty of places to sit for a quick slice.
author: Price M.

description: Mustafio's is close to home (1.3 blocks to be exact) but not as close as a couple other pizza places less than a block from my place.  I had the Mustafio's Special which has a little bit of everything since I couldn't decide.  The online menu has descriptions and prices for each of their pizzas making it hard to choose.  It is definitely worth the extra block to go to Mustafio's, besides the fact that the pizza is always hot and fresh Mustafio's is cleaner than most of the other pizza joints on or near Polk street.  Plus if I'm feeling really lazy Mustafio's delivers!!  lol
author: Antoine V.

description: One of my favorite places to grad a slice in the neighborhood.
author: Julie T.

description:
I ordered for delivery around at 11pm the guy on the phone wasn't very helpful infact when i called he asked for my number and address then disappeared on the phone after talking to someone while i was mid sentence. After saying hello to silence for a bit he came back on the phone, No "please hold".No "Sorry about that". Regardless, I ordered The veggie special and gave him my card number, He said "ok bye" I had to call back to see how long it would take, Which he then said 45 minutes, He didn't even tell me the total over the phone. So about an 1 hr and 15 minutes later the pizza arrived with literally 1 mushroom on it. Mushrooms where the first on the list of veggies. I almost called to complain but at this point we were past starving. We couldn't even finish the pizza, Even though our tummies weren't satisfied. The only thing I can say was the delivery guy was really nice although he didn't apologize for being late. 

Will not order again. Will not Recommend.
author: Alyssa H.

description: Not great. They told us it would be 30-45 minute delivery. It took an hour and 10 minutes. And they got our order wrong. The crust is thick (I prefer thin). This was our first try with this place - won't be trying again.
author: Eve F.

description: Words cannot describe how awesome this pizza is. To be honest, we cancelled the pizza at first through grubhub...but they ended up giving us the pizza anyways. We ended up eating and would gladly pay double for the same pizza. They're crust is absolutely phenomenal and their service is as polite as pie. Nice customer service, awesome pizza, and a great night!
author: Lorenzo S.

description: Slow delivery (25 minutes slower than the "confirmed" delivery time on Yelp Eat24). Pizza arrived cold; cheese was hardened and rubbery and the crust was overly chewy, like it had been sitting out for awhile. And I ordered at 9 pm on a Monday, not a very busy time for delivery. Toppings were burnt! Overall, extremely disappointing. I won't be ordering from here again. BOO
author: K. E.

description: This place is amazing. I usually only order by the slice and they are delicious. The inside is super clean and organized with a tv so you can enjoy while you eat. You can easily buy a slice and a soda for 5 dollars and it will fill you up quickly. The best pizza spot on polk street, hands down.
author: Alexander D.

description: Pizza is oily and bland. Not worth my time or the price. Pizza taste like the 7-11 pizza. Cardboard with cheese and sauce
author: Allen L.

description: Love this place their pizza is always fresh They have delicious salads and the best dessert  Highly recommended
author: Nico Greek S.

description: Don't do it. If it's late and you're craving pizza just go to bed. Horrible delivery service.
author: Katie M.

description: Crispy crust, cheesy cheese, hella meat, homemade ranch on ranch on ranch, seemingly real Italians in the kitchen, and we haven't gotten sick yet. We offered to drink tap water & the babes fed us complimentary Crystal Geyser. We will be back
author: Devon M.

description: I've ordered pizza from here 3 times through eat24.com. The first time it was so hot that we had to wait a minute to eat. The 2nd & 3rd time was just warm. The pizza was good however but trying to get that "hot" status again.
author: May G.

description: Great new addition to Polk St. Big, cheesy slices with a nice crunchy crusts. Prices are great, especially for the size of the slices and the amount of toppings you get on a combo.
author: Jon M.

description: terrible pizza. an hour to bring doughy soggy sloppy flavorless pie to my door 4 blocks away?  avoid.
author: Jim R.
